content:
She lay as if at play
Her life had leaped away—
Intending to return—
But not so soon—

Her merry Arms, half dropt—
As if for lull of sport—
An instant had forgot—
The Trick to start—

Her dancing Eyes—ajar—
As if their Owner were
Still sparkling through
For fun—at you—

Her Morning at the door—
Devising, I am sure—
To force her sleep—
So light—so deep—
cleaned: she lay as if play her life had leaped away intending return but not so soon her merry arms half dropt as if lull sport an instant had forgot the trick start her dancing eyes ajar as if owner still sparkling fun at you her morning the door devising i sure force her sleep so light so deep
